ptdb.common.dto

Class XMLDBModelWithReferenceChanges

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptdb.common.dto.XMLDBModelWithReferenceChanges

  • public class XMLDBModelWithReferenceChanges
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulate the information needed by the business layer to perform a save operation with parent references being affected by the change done on the model to be saved.

    The Data Transfer Object pattern is used here.

    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yousef Alsaeed
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (yalsaeed)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (yalsaeed)

      The list of parents being affected by the changes made on the model.
      (package private) java.lang.String _versionName
      The new model name that will be stored in the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLDBModelWithReferenceChanges

        public XMLDBModelWithReferenceChanges(XMLDBModel modelToBeSaved,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> parentsList,
                                      java.lang.String versionName)
        Construct a new instance of this class and set the member variables.
        Parameters:
        modelToBeSaved - The model to be saved in the database with no changes.
        parentsList - List of parents that should have the new model name as the reference inside them with the old content.
        versionName - A new name of the model which will be converted into a model that contains the content of the modelToBeSaved before saving it.
